H0.text: The Bacillus Calmette-Guerin vaccine is used for immunisation against what. Tuberculosis

H1.text: The Bacillus Calmette-Guerin vaccine is used for immunisation against what. Leprosy

H2.text: The Bacillus Calmette-Guerin vaccine is used for immunisation against what. Influenza

H3.text: The Bacillus Calmette-Guerin vaccine is used for immunisation against what. Phthsis

A4.text: Albert Calmette and Camille Guérin achieved the first genuine success in immunization against tuberculosis in 1906, using attenuated bovine-strain tuberculosis.

A5.text: The only available vaccine as of 2021 is bacillus Calmette-Guérin (BCG).
